term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - logarithmic normal distribution of a macromolecular assembly
term.title: logarithmic normal distribution

item.text: A continuous distribution with the differential mass-distribution function of the form: fw(x)dx = (1/(a.sqrt(π.x)).exp^(-1/a^).ln^2(x/b)).dxdx is a parameter characterizing the chain length, such as relative molecular mass or degree of polymerization and a and b are positive adjustable parameters.
